mapper.select:
SELECT g.pdtNum, g.pdtName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, pdtPrice, pdtVolume, pdtDes, pdtImg, pdtThumbNail, pdtSection, rgdate FROM fila_product g
INNER JOIN fila_category c ON g.cateCode = c.cateCode WHERE c.cateCodeRef = #{cateCodeRef};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fila_pdtcomment ( pdtNum, userId, cmtDes, rgdate ) VALUES ( #{pdtNum}, #{userId}, #{cmtDes}, Now() )
mapper.select: SELECT pdtNum, userId, cmtPdtNum, cmtDes, rgdate FROM fila_pdtcomment WHERE pdtNum = #{pdtNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fila_cart ( userId, pdtNum, cartVolume, rgdate ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{pdtNum}, #{cartVolume}, now() );
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.* FROM fila_cart a INNER JOIN fila_product b ON a.pdtNum = b.pdtNum WHERE a.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY cartNum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fila_order (orderId, userId, orderTo, userAdd1, userAdd2, userAdd3, orderTel, totalPrice, rgdate) VALUES ('222', #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderTo}, #{userAdd1}, #{userAdd2}, #{userAdd3}, #{orderTel}, #{totalPrice}, Now());
INSERT INTO fila_order_details (orderDetailsNum, orderId, pdtNum, cartVolume) VALUES( #{orderDetailsNum}, #{orderId}, #{pdtNum}, #{cartVolume} )
